text: I have a menu with some anchor links - on mobile when I click the the anchor link the menu does not auto close after clicking a second anchor link (but does scroll to it behind the menu) so its not obvious the anchor link has been clicked unless you close the menu manually, would any one have   a link to some code that would work here?
this worked for me
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CFPGEKRJ7/p1557220563032200?thread_ts=1557048846.026900&cid=CFPGEKRJ7>

I’m trying to preview the posts page in the design tool - and it keeps displaying the listing page… in addition to that, the post page is from a completely different blog template even though I’ve selected the correct on in settings.

If there are existing posts - does it take time for HubSpot to switch templates?
you should be able to choose which blog for the preview
click blog preview to see a list of blogs
i have noticed in the past that i need to toggle away and back to the post view to get the correct view
Note you'll need to use "Live preview with display options" to see that dropdown.
can you pls share the link of that course?

Hi guys!
I need to optimize all my file under the files manager (i use a not image not optimized at all).
Is there a way to export and download all the files manager? (then i’ll optimize them with a script)

you could use FTP.

Though if you’re talking image size. you can use `resize_image_url` and the images output on the website will be at the sizes you want.
I do this for all my custom modules so marketers can’t blow up the load time of a site by uploading giant billboard size images.
I’m using ?noresize (which as the opposite effect) to avoid the weird compression :confused:
the better route to go is to control the resize sebastien
Ok :slightly_smiling_face:
I’ll use FTP to at least optimize them once in one time first then i’ll update my website to use resize_image_url
Is this just me? Or is anyone else experiencing this issue? (All landing page folders)
That “wide net” caused a lot of stress and lost time for a lot of people… might want to rethink that one in the future.
Fixed
what is the maximum number of posts a listing page can display?
boo
Never noticed this setting -I’m going to talk a look. Thanks.
critical additional information here thanks!
